gameDetails.name: Chip Theory Games: Promo Pack 2019
gameDetails.description:
An assortment of seven chips usable with Too Many Bones, Undertow, Cloudspire, and Splice & Dice.

Contains:
· Heads/Tails Chip (Too Many Bones: Undertow)
· "Like a Florist" Tantrum (First Day of Spring Alternate Art, Too Many Bones)
·  2019 Convention Promo (Timothy lll Esq. Heirs Defector, Cloudspire)
· "Nightmare" Picket (Halloween Collection Alternate Art, Too Many Bones)
· Bloodthirsty Gila Goblin (BGG Promotion Chip, Too Many Bones and Too Many Bones: Undertow) 5pt - (Skills: Signal 2, Engulf)
· The Grint who stole Christmas (Holiday Alternate Art of Nobulous and Abomination, Too Many Bones: Splice & Dice)
